N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 402.1 - Organizational responsibilities

State Regulations
(a) The social services district shall be
responsible for developing and implementing the social services program as
required by the department. (b) The
specific responsibilities of the social services district include, but are not
limited to, the following: (1)
maintaining a
resources inventory of services provided by the social services district and of
services available from other public and private community agencies; (2)
assessing needs of the
community; (3)
developing the
district component of the comprehensive annual social services program
plan; (4)
determining programmatic
and financial eligibility for services; (5)
developing individual plans for
services; (6)
authorizing services
provision, including payments to providers (or under certain circumstances to
the clients directly) in order to achieve a service goal; and
(7)
arranging for the provision of
services. Notes
